disbursementsGeomapAggregation: $apply=<filterString>groupby((GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,ComponentName),aggregate(TotalDisbursedAmount with sum as disbursed, TotalSignedAmount with sum as signed, TotalCommittedAmount with sum as committed, GrantAgreementId with countdistinct as count))
disbursementsMulticountryGeomapAggregati: $apply=<filterString>groupby((GrantAgreement/MultiCountry/MultiCountryName,GrantAgreement/Component/ComponentName),aggregate(TotalDisbursedAmount with sum as disbursed, TotalSignedAmount with sum as signed, TotalCommittedAmount with sum as committed, GrantAgreement/GrantAgreementId with countdistinct as count))
